summary: Provides a comprehensive test suite for Amazon S3 operations using the Moto mock library and Boto3, exercising bucket creation, deletion, configuration, object upload/download, versioning, ACLs, CORS, website settings, presigned URLs, multipart uploads, checksum handling, pagination, and error conditions.
business_intent: Ensures that the S3 client implementation behaves correctly against the AWS S3 API, detects regressions, and validates edgeâ€‘case handling in a controlled test environment.
